title: So i just got a warning for one of pleeps post? Riot wtf??
body:
If you look at the thread, it's pleeps comment that is removed. Also i know i didn't post that comment, and it seems like something pleep would say.

Here's a link to the thread, http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/MZ31IA3c-before-arguing-on-gb-remember-to-screenshot-your-opponents-rank-and-post-it-in-your-argument?comment=00000000

Riot pls
